title: US Invesment In China, Vaping, Financial Literacy
itunes:title: US Invesment In China, Vaping, Financial Literacy
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Trade reporter Shawn Donnan discusses the Bloomberg exclusive story that Trump administration officials are discussing ways to limit U.S. investors’ portfolio flows into China. Dr Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, discusses the current status of vaping and e-cigarette related dangers. Tim Sheehan, CEO at Greenlight, discusses how his company can help parents raise financially smart kids. Bloomberg News Washington Politics Reporter Ryan Teague Beckwith wraps up a tumultuous week in our nation’s capital. And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade.

 

 Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
